entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Throwing an exception through a synchronized shared generic method does not release the lock on Windows X86 #107664
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Move return merging from fgAddInternal to a late phase #107663
    Future
  • Inconsistent warning behavior for RUC/RDC on base types #107660
  • [API Proposal]: Add `DhcpLeaseExpires` and `DhcpLeaseObtained` to IPv4InterfaceProperties #107659
  • Tokens that reference generated assembly members not populated properly #107658
    9.0.0
  • .Net9 RC1 Crash when creating Java Runtime through interop (and also .Net9 all previews) #107651
    9.0.0
  • Unable to enable server GC in dotnet 8.0.8 on linux #107649
  • ARM64-to-ARM32 cross build is broken due to missing OPENSSL_gmtime #107647
  • MSIS7012 : The same client browser session has made '6' requests in the last '1' seconds. Contact your administrator for details #107646
  • Implement analyzer that validates MetadataUpdateHandlerAttribute usage #107644
  • Bad codegen for `Vector256.Multiply(Vector256<double>...)` when AVX is available but AVX2 is not #107640
    Future
  • Failing test cases System.IO.FileSystem #107636
  • UnmanagedCallersOnly_Namespaced fails on windows #107631
    10.0.0
  • BasicObjectsRoundTripAndMatch fails #107629
  • Test Failure: readytorun.r2rdump.FrameworkTests.R2RDumpTests #107622
  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed 'sourceIntervals[targetReg] != nullptr' during 'LSRA allocate' #107621
    10.0.0
  • [Swift Interop] Lowering fixed buffers #107620
  • More folding to vpternlogd? #107619
    10.0.0
  • I keep getting "Npgsql.NpgsqlException (0x80004005): Exception while performing SSL handshake" when I try to run migrations #107600
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 3 Regressions on 9/5/2024 6:12:12 PM #107623
  • [API Proposal]: JsonSourceGenerationOptions should support ReferenceHandler #107597
  • Error when deserializing using system-text-json polymorphism #107595
  • Uncaught ThreadInterruptedException does not print unhandled exception message to console #107594
  • Test failure: System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.CacheTests.JsonSerializerOptionsUpdateHandler_ClearingDoesntPreventSerialization #107589

Closed

  • superpmi collection: benchmark collection FSharp.dll fails #107520
    10.0.0
  • superpmi collection: linux arm64/arm32 fail to create CORE_ROOT #107522
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'block->hasHndIndex() == true' #107524
    10.0.0
  • Managed debuggers not recognizing that managed code has been loaded when running tests via VS Test Explorer on main #107217
  • Tracking: Improve error experience when there's a missing runtime or framework #56146
    10.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Tests.BinaryFormatterTests.SerializeHugeObjectGraphs #100979
    9.0.0
  • Building CORE_ROOT is broken #107632
    10.0.0
  • Socket.Dispose() hangs on Mac when invoked concurrently with a blocking Receive(Message)From #47342
    Future
  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed '(unop->Type == TYP_LONG) && (op1->Type == TYP_INT)' during 'Optimize Induction Variables' #107543
    9.0.0
  • Update System.Linq.Expressions ref code for #94069 #95077
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 9/6/2024 10:52:37 PM #107625
  • [android][infra] Runtime tests on Android are not getting sent to Helix #107551
    9.0.0
  • Running dotnet app.exe should produce reasonable error #37749
    Future
  • Test failure in Runtime_107146 with `DOTNET_EnablePOPCNT=0` #107519
    9.0.0
  • Make crypto tests resilient to Azure Linux OpenSSL #106489
    9.0.0
  • Vector128.GreaterThan returns negative number #107596
  • [ios] `HybridGlobalization`, functions calculating `matchLength` should return PNSE #106465
    10.0.0
  • `PriorityQueue<TElement, TPriority>.Remove` method violates min-heap invariant #107292
    9.0.0
  • 'dynamic' keyword not working as expected #107512
  • Should we check-in a default set of tasks to make it easier to work within vscode? #69135
    Future
  • Use GetPathOfFileAbove where appropriate #30468
    Future
  • BinaryFormatter tests are no longer skipped when ran against source-built runtime #107534
  • [Fuzzing] NrbfDecoderFuzzer: The output char buffer is too small to contain the decoded characters #107515
  • [NativeAOT] NativeAOT .NET 9 preview 7 apps hang due to generating infinite loops for certain `typeof` comparisons #107300
    9.0.0
  • Port System docs for .NET 9 APIs #105987
    9.0.0
  • Port System.ComponentModel docs for .NET 9 APIs #105983
    9.0.0
  • [WASI] fix event loop init #104803
    10.0.0
  • SPMI: Update AzureKeyVault task #107078
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • WebSocket Feedback Follow-up #107662
    area-System.Net
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder: fix IL reference tokens to another generated assembly members #107661
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Remove unused freebsd elf32/elf64 header references #107657
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "Avoid taking lock for empty bucket in ConcurrentDictionary.TryRemove …" #107656
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Collections, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Revert "Avoid taking lock for empty bucket in ConcurrentDictionary.TryRemove …" #107655
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • Fix config source gen binding value types to null configuration values #107654
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 10.0.0
  • Revert "Avoid taking lock for empty bucket in ConcurrentDictionary.TryRemove …" #107653
    area-System.Collections
  • Remove `BaseDomain` #107652
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add the _requiresAlign8 bool to the compare and mangled name for GCStaticEETypeNode.cs #107650
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove some implicit Helper Method Frames (HMF) #107648
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Make hostfxr_get_runtime_property_value initialize out pointer to null #107645
    area-Host
  • Enable NuGet Audit and fix issues #107639
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Add missing `[RequiresDynamicCode]` attributes to System.Linq.Expressions API in ref assembly #107638
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Fix build-runtime-tests-and-send-to-helix auth for internal PRs #107635
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Run new block layout only in backend #107634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [Tar] Fill in the file size even if the file is empty. #107633
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Formats.Tar, 9.0.0
  • Remove vestigial ReadOnlySequence.SequenceType.Empty #107630
    area-System.Memory
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Include .NET version in templates package id #107628
    Servicing-consider, area-Workloads
  • [NRBF] Arrays of any records #107627
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • [release/9.0][browser] Enable the log profiler #107626
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove redundant !fgIsCommaThrow(morphedTree) assert #107624
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Split the HostApplicationBuilder configuration. #107616
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [mini] Don't use Unwind Backtrace on android-amd64 #107615
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix HashSet copy constructor handling of instances that have fallen back to the randomized hashcode generator. #107613
    area-System.Collections, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix JsonSchemaExporter support for global UnmappedMemberHandling settings. #107604
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix heap corruption issue in PriorityQueue.Remove #107603
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [mono] Fix swizzle_mask type #107602
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix SVE ExtendWidening ConditionalSelect tests #107601
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Include version error message when missing WASI SDK #107599
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Consider existence of EETypes and metadata for typeof checks #107598
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #107592
    needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #107591
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] [mono] Fix crash in emit_llvmonly_handler_start #107590
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono

Merged

  • Always pass LoaderAllocator when creating Assembly #107643
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix placement of loop exit blocks in handler regions #107582
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix SuperPMI collections #107588
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Update more C code gen #107593
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: disable scev analysis for non-integral types #107618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing `[RequiresDynamicCode]` attributes to System.Linq.Expressions API in ref assembly #107580
    area-System.Linq.Expressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Fix crash in emit_llvmonly_handler_start #107461
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #107572
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.35
  • All mobile platforms go down the RunTests.sh path, not just browser. #107563
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Disable UnitTest_GVM_TypeLoadException for fullAOT jobs #107502
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Include .NET version in templates package id #107182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • Improve error message when running `dotnet app.exe` #107484
    area-Host
  • Make Half max precision test culture-invariant #105685
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix ISA check in Runtime_107146 test #107539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add a SearchValues implementation for values with unique low nibbles #106900
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [iOS] [HybridGlobalization] Throw PNSE when methods with matchLength are used #107390
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Fix JsonSchemaExporter support for global UnmappedMemberHandling settings. #107545
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • Fix heap corruption issue in PriorityQueue.Remove #107550
    area-System.Collections, 10.0.0
  • Disable binary formatter tests when DotNetBuildSourceOnly. #107549
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [NRBF] throw SerializationException when a surrogate character is read #107532
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Consider existence of EETypes and metadata for typeof checks #107347
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2534549 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add [DebuggerDisplay] to CancellationTokenSource #105764
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Fix thread static cleanup paths #107554
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] more cases when looking up unmanaged delegates #107113
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 10.0.0
  • Remove FCThrowRes from AssemblyNative::IsDynamic #107574
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #107578
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.10
  • JIT: Add simple late layout pass #107483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Clean up some FIXMEs in the jiterpreter #107562
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [WASI] improve single-threaded threadpool #107395
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Make DAC and ProfToEEInterfaceImpl stop using BaseDomain #107570
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [browser][host] Include system environment variables when resolving ASPNETCORE_URLS #107392
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Provide System.CodeDom package readme #107372
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • Introducing new event for failed http requests #106284 #106964
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan #107166
    area-System.IO.Compression, 10.0.0
  • Expand "return condition" into "return condition ? true : false" #107499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Process LinkerArg for wasm targets #107194
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser
  • Remove JitGenericHandleCache #106843
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] ARM64-SVE: Allow op inside conditionalselect to be non HWintrinsic #107581
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove helper method frame from Profiler hooks #107152
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix config source gen binding with SslClientAuthenticationOptions #107579
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 10.0.0
  • Use system brotli on Unix non-portable builds #107225
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [DiagnosticSource] Add version event to EventSources used for out-of-proc monitoring #107576
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix `emitter::emitSplit` to not create zero-sized method fragment #107568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods and optimise `Shuffle` for non-constant `indices` #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Move performance testing logic into python scripts #101143
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/9.0] Arm: Fix the base register used for restoring register from stack #107584
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove ILCompiler package reference #107583
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Improve PipeReader.AdvanceTo(consumed) when bytes have been examined already #107360
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Overhaul Main Workflow Docs #107415
    documentation, 10.0.0
  • Allow preinitializing spans created from arrays #107575
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough restrictions in `Compiler::fgOptimizeBranch` #105625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Consolidate log for reliability framework #107517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] JIT ARM64: Don't emit `mov` for zero case in jump tables for shift intrinsics #107487
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [s390x] Use consistent shift instruction #107559
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, arch-s390x, community-contribution
  • [mono] Set unwind table kind #107462
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Basic ISOSDacInterface::GetMethodDescData #106413
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable the log profiler #107434
    arch-wasm, community-contribution, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/9.0] TypeName fuzzer and bug fixes #107533
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [release/9.0] Increase timeout for SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits test #107120
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, test-bug, 9.0.0
  • Fix IPGlobalProperties.DomainName to return string.Empty when domain name is not set #107241
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] [ILStrip] Fix passing assemblies using relative path #107548
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • [release/9.0] [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #107398
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: random partial compilation stress mode #107561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Increase jiterpreter limits #107557
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Try to maintain fallthrough in `Compiler::fgSplitEdge` #107419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Allow to build browser in library mode #106388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, linkable-framework, os-browser
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix a set of minor DAC bugs I encountered recently #104919
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][mini] Prefer calling llvmaot compiled method instead of inlining it with JIT #107401
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Unify linking file composition for wasi and wasm. #107547
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Clarify XML comments for Utf8Parser.TryParse to reflect case insensitivity #103861
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] BinaryFormatter tests improvements #107540
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Revert "don't define HAS_CUSTOM_BLOCKS on mono (#106764)" #107558
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 128.0.6613.119, windows: 128.0.6613.120 #107504
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Avoid NullReferenceException in CharEnumerator after calling Dispose #105296
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    no-recent-activity, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • add support for parallel Connect #106374
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] System.Net.NameResolution #107351
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Emscripten version reference for RTM build #106881
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix alloca builder creation #107464
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Ilc assert with locals in release config #2682

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add _requiresAlign8 to the compare method and name for GCStaticEETypeNode to avoid asserts when sorting. #2681
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • Added documentation for binding most of the Swift types #2678
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Initial version of the managed stack traces on Browser #2677
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reenable the first run telemetry tests in .net 6 branches #43328
  • SDK ships stale copies of .NET packages that are still being built #43325
  • Consider reporting agent log content through pipe back to dotnet-watch on each apply change #43323
  • dotnet-watch can't handle file renames performed via File.Move #43320
    Backlog
  • Unable to authenticate against the OpenShift internal registry using a token. #43319
  • Is it possible to get dotnet build to produce a Windows and a Linux executable? #43317
  • -bl is not working with dotnet run #43310
  • SDK 9.0 rc2 carries microsoft.net.sdk.aspire 9.0.0-preview4 which causes aspire workloads and templates to disappear. #43301
  • After installing .NET SDK 9.0 RC2, creating 6.0/8.0 Blazor WASM project requires September Servicing (we canceled the ship) feeds #43300

Closed

  • Implicit restore in `pack` and `publish` should not restore projects with IsPackable=false and IsPublishable=false #42476

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #43329
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43326
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Tests #43324
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add Aspire service tests #43295
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Revert the asn1 changes that flowed from net6 as they aren't needed i… #43294
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix some typos #43327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the extra set of testexecutiondirectory #43190
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the stale limit by a year #43267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix all StrBegin comments to be StrBegins to correctly show up in the… #43264
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add a Locked comment for NETSDK1147 to prevent overlocalization #43263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix feature band when assigning a workload to a workload install type #43231
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Blazor] Fix hot reload for components with collocated JS files #43199
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [StaticWebAssets] Improve Up to date check logic #43156
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Remove longstanding comment from C# console template #42497
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Clean up error experience when downloading non-tools #43045
    untriaged, Area-Tools, 9.0.1xx
  • Add an implicit reference to the Generate SBOM task #43151
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Hot Reload: Handle file deletions correctly #42718
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Add support for join point vertical job in vmr-build.yml #43288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add NativeAOT test scenarios #43292
    untriaged, Area-NativeAOT
  • Multi arch containers #43085
    Area-Containers
  • Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #42861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Stack overflow when handling chained/nested else-if #75043

Closed

  • Test Plan for "Partial Properties" feature #73090
    17.12
  • EnC workspace does not report on generators diagnostics #70863
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35309.249 #75039
  • Params collection in collection expression's .Add method causes crash by StackOverflow #74734
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35309.201 #75036

PullRequests

Created

  • Cherry pick changes to vscode release #75047
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75045
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix stack adjustment when emitting stackalloc #75042
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • docs: Fix "Augment user code" example #75041
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • docs: Correct SDK version in documentation to match global.json #75038
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Remove MS.CA.Test.Resources.Proprietary PackageReference #75037
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Fix issue where closing sourcelink document threw if not opened #75046
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Field-backed properties: support partial properties with auto-implemented accessors and with initializers #74959
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Field Keyword
  • Expose sourcelink option to VSCode #75044
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Report source generator failures in Hot Reload diagnostics #75029
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Cherry-pick sourcelink casing fix #75033
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Workaround for InvalidOperationException thrown from EmitSolutionUpdateResults.GetAllDiagnosticsAsync #75011
    Interactive-Debugging, Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Handle infinite cycles through params collection initializers #74899
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Semantic snippets: handle case with inline statement snippets before member access expression #74966
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix symbol info in identifier name in object initializer #74582
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix typo in RequestTelemetryLogger.UpdateTelemetryData #75028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Allow suppressing nullability warnings in more ref scenarios #74498
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Better Collection Expression Conversion From Expression #74993
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, New Feature - ParamsCollections, 17.12
  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add optional value to dart-lab yml #74953
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move build and test to an newer Ubuntu image with longer support #74881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.content:

entry.content:

Created

    Backlog
  • maui blazor , js fetch post FREEZE the resonpse #24690

Closed

  • [iOS] Collectionview itemslayout styling changes with footer #21728

    Backlog
  • OnPlatform doesn't work with AppThemeBinding on Windows in Release mode. #19388

  • [Windows] [RC2] Conditional ToolbarItem Text Display Using OnIdiom Not Working in Release Mode #18697
